name: issable
description: Swiss army knife for runtime payload sanitisation and type-checking.

scripts.browserify:
browserify dist/node/index.js > dist/browser/issable.js --standalone Issable --global-transform [ babelify --configFile ./.dist.babelrc ] -p [ @jsdevtools/browserify-banner --template "<%= pkg.name %> v<%= pkg.version %>
(c) 2021 <%= pkg.author %>
Release under <%= pkg.license %> license." ]
scripts.browserify:minify:
browserify dist/node/index.js > dist/browser/issable.min.js --standalone Issable --global-transform [ babelify --configFile ./.dist.babelrc ] -p tinyify -p [ @jsdevtools/browserify-banner --template "<%= pkg.name %> v<%= pkg.version %>
(c) 2021 <%= pkg.author %>
Release under <%= pkg.license %> license." ]
scripts.build: npm run tsc && mkdirp dist/browser; mkdirp dist/node && npm run browserify && npm run browserify:minify

author: calvintwr
